cast.overview: After her adoptive mother dies, Hortense, a successful black optometrist, seeks out her birth mother. She's shocked when her research leads her to Cynthia, a working class white woman.
cast.title: Secrets & Lies

details.biography:
Michele Austin is a British actress. She best known for her role as Yvonne Hemmingway on ITV's The Bill, for which she won the Screen Nation Award for Best Television Actress, and for her portrayal of Chantelle in Hard Truths, for which she won the National Society of Film Critics award for Best Supporting Actress.

Description above from the Wikipedia article Michele Austin, licensed under CC-BY-SA, full list of contributors on Wikipedia.
details.name: Michele Austin
